metadata.title: Can the encoder interface of the RZ/T2M be used with two channels?

sections.content:
Question:
Can the encoder interface of the RZ/T2M be used with two channels?
Answer:
Yes. Two channels can be used by combining with each of the EnDat2.2, BiSS®-C, HIPERFACE DSL, FA-CODER®, and A-formatTM encoders.
Suitable Products
RZ/T2M
